classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

color.description: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

disabled.description: If `true`, the label should be displayed in a disabled state.

error.description: If `true`, the label should be displayed in an error state.

filled.description: If `true`, the label should use filled classes key.

focused.description: If `true`, the input of this label is focused (used by `FormGroup` components).

required.description: If `true`, the label will indicate that the input is required.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.colorSecondary: Styles applied to the root element if the color is secondary.
descriptions.focused: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `focused={true}`.
descriptions.disabled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `disabled={true}`.
descriptions.error: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `error={true}`.
descriptions.filled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `filled={true}`.
descriptions.required: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `required={true}`.
descriptions.asterisk: Styles applied to the asterisk element.
